function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uneven population distribution in the building","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement measures to regulate and control the distribution of occupants","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, scheduling software, zoning and access control systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, public health officials","Owner":"Facility managers, public health officials"},{"Description":"High number of infected people in the building","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and outbreak","Mitigation":"Implement infection control measures, promote hygiene practices, and segregate high-risk areas","Technologies":"Air purification systems, ventilation optimization, surface disinfection technologies","People":"Building occupants, public health officials, medical professionals","Owner":"Facility managers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Low energy consumption patterns leading to specific occupancy levels","Impact":"Potential limitation on the activities that can be conducted in the building","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient HVAC systems, optimize building insulation, and adjust occupancy scheduling","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, occupancy sensors, energy management software","People":"Facility managers, building occupants, energy efficiency consultants","Owner":"Facility managers, energy efficiency consultants"}]}
